text: 6|164|illeogalodoe naega hananim oee daleun geos-e guhandan mal-inyo geubun eun manmul-ui junim-isila nuguna geu ga eod-eun geos-eun geuegelo dol-aogeo neul nugudeun tain-ui jim-eul geuga jilsu eobsnola neohuineun junimkkelo gwiuiha ni geubunkkeseoneun neohuideul-i dallihaessdeon modeun sasil-eul neohuiege allyeojulila
